metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8425 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
includes/database.php in ZoneMinder before 1.32.3 has XSS in the construction of SQL-ERR messages.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-8425` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
